question: Trump and Harris agree to Fox News debate?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Fox News (Fox News Channel, FNC) announces Donald Trump and Kamala Harris have agreed to a debate hosted by them between July 20, and October 15, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For this market to resolve to "Yes" it is only necessary that Fox News announces that it will host such a debate. Whether the debate actually occurs will have no bearing on the resolution of this market.

The resolution source for this market is official information from Fox News.

question: Was Biden campaign call fake?
description:
On July 22, during a campaign event in which Biden called in, Kamala said “I know you’re still on the rec…on the call.” prompting speculation that it wasn’t a live call-in but a recording (see: https://x.com/MarioNawfal/status/1815674259487826385).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if definitive evidence emerges that Joe Biden's call during Kamala Harris's campaign event on July 22 was pre-recorded or AI-generated by July 31, 2024, at 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No." 

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Will another man be the 2024 Democratic VP nominee?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if a man other than Mark Kelly, Josh Shapiro, Roy Cooper, Andy Beshear, Tim Walz, Pete Buttigieg, J. B. Prtizker, Mark Cuban, Wes Moore, Barack Obama, Gavin Newsom, Tim Ryan, Joe Biden, Raphael Warnock, William McRaven, or Bernie Sanders is the 2024 nominee of the Democratic Party for U.S. vice president. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of official Democrat sources, including https://democrats.org/.

Any replacement of the nominee before election day will not change the resolution of the market.

events.title: Democratic VP nominee?
events.description: This is a market on the selection of the Democratic vice presidential nominee for the upcoming election.

question: Will another woman be the 2024 Democratic VP nominee?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if a woman other than Gretchen Whitmer, Michelle Obama, Hillary Clinton, Kamala Harris, Elizabeth Warren, Tammy Duckworth, Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, Tammy Baldwin, or Amy Klobuchar is the 2024 nominee of the Democratic Party for U.S. vice president. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of official Democrat sources, including https://democrats.org/.

Any replacement of the nominee before election day will not change the resolution of the market.

question: Will another man be the Democratic Presidential Nominee?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if a man other than Wes Moore, Pete Buttigieg, Mark Kelly, Robert Kennedy Jr., Gavin Newsom, Mark Cuban, Josh Shapiro, Joe Manchin, Mitt Romney, Roy Cooper, Raphael Warnock, J. B. Pritzker, Andy Beshear, Bernie Sanders, Sherrod Brown, or John Fetterman wins the 2024 nomination of the Democratic Party for U.S. president. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of official Democratic Party sources, including https://democrats.org/.

Any replacement of the democratic nominee before election day will not change the resolution of the market.

events.title: Biden D-Nom replacement?
events.description: This is a market on the likelihood of Joe Biden being replaced as the Democratic nominee for the presidential election.

question: Will another woman be the Democratic Presidential Nominee?

events.title: Biden D-Nom replacement?

question: Will Biden say "Drop out" during drop out speech?
description:
Joe Biden is scheduled to give a speech Wednesday July 24, about his decision to end his reelection campaign. This market refers to anything Biden says during the first speech he gives addressing his decision to withdraw from the Presidential race.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Biden says "Drop out". Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

If Biden does not give a speech addressing his decision to withdraw from the Presidential race by July 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET this market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the phrase regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the phrase will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count (e.g. "dropping out" or "dropped out"  will not count).

The resolution source will be the video of the speech.

events.title: What will Biden say during drop out speech?

question: Will the Director of FBI be fired/resign?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Christopher A. Wray is no longer Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation for any length of time between July 24, and August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

An announcement of Wray's resignation or removal before this market's end date will immediately resolve this market to "Yes", regardless of when the announced resignation or removal goes into effect.

This market's primary resolution source will be official information from the FBI and/or Wray, however, a consensus of credible reporting sources will also be used.

question: Biden's dropout speech over 15 minutes?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Joe Biden's dropout speech on July 24, 2024, is 15 minutes and 1 second or more. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

The duration will be measured from the moment Biden begins his speech until he concludes his final remarks.

Any Q&A session following the conclusion of his speech will not be considered.

If Biden does not give a publicly broadcast speech on July 24, 2024, ET, this market will resolve to "No."

The resolution source will be video footage of the speech.

question: Will Joe Biden be sitting during dropout speech?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Joe Biden is seated at any point during his dropout speech on July 24, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Biden will be considered seated if he is sitting on a chair, stool, or any other seat while delivering his speech.

Any Q&A session following the conclusion of his speech will not be considered.

If Biden does not give a publicly broadcast speech on July 24, 2024, ET, this market will resolve to "No."

The resolution source will be video footage of the speech.

events.title: Will Joe Biden be sitting during dropout speech?

question: JD & Usha Vance divorce before election?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if J.D. Vance and/or Usha Vance announce their intention to divorce between July 24 and November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

An announcement by November 4 of their intention to divorce will be sufficient for a "Yes" resolution, regardless of whether the divorce later actually occurs, or whether the actual divorce occurs outside of the timeframe of this market.

The resolution source will be statements from J.D. Vance, Usha Vance, and/or their representatives, however a definitive consensus of credible media reporting may be considered.
